summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2724 for the improvement of Surber Avenue and Surber Place, from the south margin of East Forty -fifth Street to the intersection of Surber Place with Laurel Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains therein, under Ordinance No. 32004, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
